scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -c -f umd -u component -n components -o build/components.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/component.js -c -m -o build/components.min.js && rm -f build/components.zip && zip -j build/components.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/components.js build/components.min.js
